name: Kleptica
description:
Kleptica is a platformer where you go on raids trying to sustain your everyday needs, and try to powerhouse your way through whatever the village people are sending at you. 

will you let them defeat you? or will you show them how a minotaur swings an axe.

Kleptica was in development for around 3 months, any donations to help continue new games from arising would be hugly appreciated. Thanks for playing my game! (if you did) 

P.S. If the game trailer looks bad, it's because it's the first game trailer/trailer i've ever made. 

if there are any bugs you experienced, please let me know and i'll patch them up as soon as possible. 

- 3 eastereggs
